title: Online Course for Strengthening Management Competencies in Australia's Red Meat Processing Industry

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating practical problem-solving skills in distributed industrial environments, providing content optimized for smartphone-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can perform quality cost analysis procedures with 80% accuracy using an internet-based decision support system.
Learners propose problem-solving strategies based on Root Cause Analysis (RCA) at least three times, grounded in real-world industrial case studies.
Learners establish two or more actionable improvement plans applicable to organizational enhancement by completing activity-based projects in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
